languages.text: {n}При вашем появлении в помещении словно замирает время. Жмущиеся к стенам, затаившиеся в тенях фигуры оборачиваются к вам — все, кроме нескольких, застывших в центре с оружием в руках.{/n}

{n}Time seems to stand still when you enter. Figures cast in shadow, huddled against the walls, turn to you — everyone except the few standing frozen in the middle of the room with weapons in their hands.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}При вашем появлении в помещении словно замирает время. Жмущиеся к стенам, затаившиеся в тенях фигуры оборачиваются к вам — все, кроме нескольких, застывших в центре с оружием в руках.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Time seems to stand still when you enter. Figures cast in shadow, huddled against the walls, turn to you — everyone except the few standing frozen in the middle of the room with weapons in their hands.{/n}

{n}Time seems to stand still when you enter. Figures cast in shadow, huddled against the walls, turn to you — everyone except the few standing frozen in the middle of the room with weapons in their hands.{/n}

{n}Time seems to stand still when you enter. Figures cast in shadow, huddled against the walls, turn to you — everyone except the few standing frozen in the middle of the room with weapons in their hands.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在你走进来的那一刻，时间仿佛停止了。阴影中靠墙站在一起的几个人转身看向你，而手持武器站在房间正中央的几个人则一动不动。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Time seems to stand still when you enter. Figures cast in shadow, huddled against the walls, turn to you — everyone except the few standing frozen in the middle of the room with weapons in their hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在你走进来的那一刻，时间仿佛停止了。阴影中靠墙站在一起的几个人转身看向你，而手持武器站在房间正中央的几个人则一动不动。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El tiempo parece detenerse cuando entras. Varias figuras, acurrucadas contra las paredes y medio ocultas en la penumbra, se giran en tu dirección; todas salvo las que permanecen inmóviles en el centro de la sala empuñando armas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Time seems to stand still when you enter. Figures cast in shadow, huddled against the walls, turn to you — everyone except the few standing frozen in the middle of the room with weapons in their hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El tiempo parece detenerse cuando entras. Varias figuras, acurrucadas contra las paredes y medio ocultas en la penumbra, se giran en tu dirección; todas salvo las que permanecen inmóviles en el centro de la sala empuñando armas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Quand vous entrez dans la pièce, le temps semble se figer. Dans l'ombre du mur, vous distinguez des silhouettes recroquevillées qui se tournent vers vous en vous remarquant. Au centre de la pièce se tient un petit groupe immobile, armes dégainées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Time seems to stand still when you enter. Figures cast in shadow, huddled against the walls, turn to you — everyone except the few standing frozen in the middle of the room with weapons in their hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Quand vous entrez dans la pièce, le temps semble se figer. Dans l'ombre du mur, vous distinguez des silhouettes recroquevillées qui se tournent vers vous en vous remarquant. Au centre de la pièce se tient un petit groupe immobile, armes dégainées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Zeit scheint stillzustehen, als du den Raum betrittst. Schattenhafte Gestalten stehen gepresst an der Wand und drehen sich zu dir um – alle bis auf wenige, die mit gezückten Waffen wie erstarrt in der Mitte des Raums stehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Time seems to stand still when you enter. Figures cast in shadow, huddled against the walls, turn to you — everyone except the few standing frozen in the middle of the room with weapons in their hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Zeit scheint stillzustehen, als du den Raum betrittst. Schattenhafte Gestalten stehen gepresst an der Wand und drehen sich zu dir um – alle bis auf wenige, die mit gezückten Waffen wie erstarrt in der Mitte des Raums stehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたが踏み込んだ時、そこはまるで時間が止まったかのようだった。影に包まれ、壁に身をもたれかけた人々があなたの方を見る。部屋の中央で、武器を手に固まって立っている数人を除いては。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Time seems to stand still when you enter. Figures cast in shadow, huddled against the walls, turn to you — everyone except the few standing frozen in the middle of the room with weapons in their hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが踏み込んだ時、そこはまるで時間が止まったかのようだった。影に包まれ、壁に身をもたれかけた人々があなたの方を見る。部屋の中央で、武器を手に固まって立っている数人を除いては。{/n}

languages.text: {n}İçeri girmenle birlikte zamanın akışı durmuş gibi görünüyor. Gölgelerde oluşan şekiller, duvarlarda toplanarak sana dönüyor... Birkaç kişi dışında herkes, ellerinde silahlarıyla odanın ortasında donakalıyor.{/n}
